code: import React from'react';import'./Products.css';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Products=()=>{let[Products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{getProducts();},[]);let getProducts=async()=>{let response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/Products/Products/');let data=await response.json();setProducts(data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products-home",children:Products.map((Products,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Product-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"Product-link",to:"/Products/".concat(Products.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"product-img",src:Products.image})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-name",children:Products.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-price",children:["$",Products.price]})]})}))});};export default Products;
